items.title: [Metafilter] Tasmania to expand fire detection tech after AI cameras spot 550 blazes
items.content_html: Tasmania to expand fire detection tech after AI cameras spot 550 blazes. As fire crews were responding to two fires on Tasmania's east coast in December, an AI camera nestled in a nearby vantage point spotted a third blaze. The early detection meant the fire was extinguished just two hours later.
items.summary: Tasmania to expand fire detection tech after AI cameras spot 550 blazes. items.title: [iPhone in Canada Blog - Tips, Tricks, News, and Tutorials for Canadian iPhone Users] Feds Drop $11 Million to Bring High-Speed Internet to Rural Saskatchewan
items.content_html:
The federal government said on Friday is putting up more than $11 million to help fix spotty internet in rural and remote parts of Saskatchewan. The new funding will cover four major projects aimed at connecting over 1,920 homes (about $5,729/home) across 28 different communities, including nearly 200 Indigenous households. Announced in Meadow Lake by […]

The post Feds Drop $11 Million to Bring High-Speed Internet to Rural Saskatchewan first appeared on iPhone in Canada.

items.title: [Boing Boing] Most detailed map yet of Antarctica under the ice
items.content_html:
Researchers used satellite data and computer models of glacial movements to create a new map of Antarctica as it rests deep beneath the ice. The high-resolution imagery reveals the frozen continent's landscape in detail, including "high-relief alpine valleys, scoured lowlands, and deeply eroded ice stream troughs." — Read the rest

The post Most detailed map yet of Antarctica under the ice appeared first on Boing Boing.
